DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate adaptive radiotherapy ( ART ) head neck cancer patient comparable historical control head neck patient undergo standard intensity-modulated radiation therapy ( IMRT ) without ART .
DOC.criteria: Participants pathologically confirm cancer paranasal sinus , oropharynx , oral cavity , nasopharynx , larynx , hypopharynx , receive definitive radiation therapy without chemotherapy . Karnofsky performance status > = 70 % Women childbearing potential need negative serum pregnancy test time therapy Participants must ability understand willingness sign write consent form Female participant pregnant breast feeding Participants able comply study and/or follow procedure Participants receive induction chemotherapy radiation treatment Participants prior head neck radiation therapy Participants enrol national/international cooperative group trial
